alert.note: Alert for Adams; Denver (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 3:53PM MDT until August 03 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN DENVER AND SOUTHWESTERN ADAMS COUNTIES... At 352 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over southwestern Denver International Airport, or 12 miles northeast of Denver, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 341 PM MDT, quarter size hail was reported near Tower and 64th Avenue southwest of Denver International Airport. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Denver, northern Aurora, eastern Commerce City, Denver International Airport, D.I.A Terminal and Concourses and Watkins. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
